content: these socks use my favorite sock recipe 1 to create an easy well-fitting and very not boring masculine sock i initially designed these for my dad - a car enthusiast hence the racing-stripe-like fading rib and he always puts his feet up so i decided not to create a texture on the back of the sock there s a downloadable pdf on the pattern page and it s been updated with instructions for larger calf sizes as well 1 http //blacksquirrelberkeley com/blog/tutorial-favorite-toe-up-sock-recipe
